name: Nur
about: the PI of the lab, carries scientific curiosity, friend of cats

name: Alireza
about: Next Position: PhD Student at TU Delft, Netherlands

name: Nilufer
about: received her bachelor's degree in Bioengineering from Istanbul Technical University in 2015. She completed her Master's studies in Bioengineering from Marmara University in 2019 and joined Sabanci University as a Ph.D. candidate in the BIO program

name: Eda
about: Genetics and Bioengineering graduate of Istanbul Bilgi University. Pursuing Master's in Molecular Biology, Genetics and Bioengineering program at Sabancı University

name: Ceren
about: Next Position: Clinical Trial Assistant & Application Specialist at Pfizer

name: Gulin
about: is graduate student in BIO program at Sabancı University, having a bachelors degree from Yeditepe University and master degree from Acibadem University. She is interested in understanding of neurodegenerative and neuropsychiatric diseases by creating disease models, and using pharmacogenomic approches to find novel treatment methods. She is crazy about theater and movies.

name: Yomna
about: is a graduate student aims to understand the brain and its disease forms in order to offer novel therapeutic solutions for them. She has worked as a TA in Biochemistry at Mansoura University, Egypt since 2018. She has previously worked as a Pharmacist after graduation. She has graduated from the Faculty of Pharmacy, Mansoura University, Egypt with a BSc in Pharmaceutical Sciences in 2017

name: Efe
about: Next Position: MSc Student in FOKUS Life Sciences program at the University of Würzburg

name: Melis
about: Next Position: MSc Student in Biochemistry at the University of Würzburg

name: Fereshteh
about: Next Position: PhD Student at Tarbiat Modares University

name: Ceren
about: Junior Molecular Biology, Genetics, and Bioengineering student from Sabancı University. Passionate about neurobiology and interested in drug delivery through the blood-brain barrier.

name: Ozan
about: is an undergraduate student in Sabancı University. He is interested in the blood-brain barrier, mainly in in vitro assesment of the barrier components and stem cell research.

name: Gulnaz
about: Next Position: Postdoc at Czech Academy of Sciences, Institute of Physiology, Laboratory of Adipose Tissue Biolog

name: Irem
about: received her Ph.D. in Biochemistry and Molecular Biology from Acibadem Mehmet Ali Aydinlar University. Now, joined the Mustafaoğlu lab to investigate how biomechanical forces affect the BBB model from a proteomics point of view.

name: Gulsah
about: Gülşah Sevimli accomplished her BA from Istanbul Bilgi University in 2019 and her MSc at Sabanci University in 2022. Now, she joined Mustafaoglu Lab to continue her research as a PhD student in the BIO program.

name: Zeynep
about: received her bachelor's degrees from the BIO and MAT programs of Sabancı University. As a master's student, she is now searching for the peptide shuttles that can cross the blood-brain barrier, for drug delivery. She loves stem cells, flowers and playing basketball.

name: Sahar
about: is a postdoctoral researcher funded by Marie Skłodowska-Curie Actions. Her research interests are in biocompatible and green advance nanomaterials and their surface engineering for diseases treatment and tumor-targeted stimuli-responsive drug delivery systems.

name: Nafisa
about: is a PhD student in the BIO program at Sabancı University. She completed her bachelor’s degree in Pharmacy and master’s degree in Clinical Pharmacy and Molecular Pharmacology from East West University, Dhaka, Bangladesh.

name: Gizem
about: is a PhD candidate at Sabancı University. She completed her BSc at ITU and her MSc in Genetics at Istanbul University. Her research interests are biophysics and molecular biology.

name: Sumeyra Nuran
about: is completed her bachelor's degree in molecular biology & genetics at METU. She is curious about brain diseases, blood-brain barrier, and organ-on-a-chip models. She loves animals and playing theatre.

name: Ahmet Baki
about: is a master's student in the BIO program at Sabancı University and received his bachelor's degree from the KFAU. His research interests are neurobiology and drug delivery.

name: Zulal
about: is a PhD student in the BIO program at Sabancı University. She is interested in designing novel gut-on-a-chip platforms to utilize them in organ/disease modeling. She loves planting and hiking.
